time to run and i 'm gon na finish .
not so bad as i '' m almost to the finish line .
i knew i could do it but my feet hurt .
output.sentences: Today was my first 10K and I was bound and determined to finish it with a decent time.
It slowly dawned on me before I began how hard that was actually going to be.
On the first half of the run, I thought I'd end up making a decent time.
But closer to the finish line, my body started to hurt very badly.
I ended up with a time I felt proud of, but my feet hurt so badly at the end I don't know if I'll ever do it again.
